website_summaries.verdict: Half the price of some competitors with similar technology and responsiveness.
pros: A value-priced 2-pack with user-friendly features tech-savvy customers love
Compatible with numerous devices, voice-controllable with Alexa, and easy to set up with free app
cons: A few issues with registration of the devices have been reported
The app has a few bugs that sometimes require stopping and resetting

customer_reviews.title: unnecessary permissions (make phone calls
customer_reviews.text: Jinvoo app required to use. This app requires extensive, unnecessary permissions (make phone calls, access contacts list), and would not run without authorizing these. I'm returning the outlets for this reason, though I do not know how well these function as hardware. I will instead use the Amazon credit to purchase smart plugs I know and trust (in my case, TP-Link ones).
customer_reviews.author: Some Internet Guy

customer_reviews.title: Really useful, good price
customer_reviews.text: At first we were bummed we had to have their app running on our phone in order for these to work.. totally drains the battery. So we deleted the app, and surprise! They still connect to Alexa! We use these in our entryway and kitchen so we can yell at Alexa to turn the lights on when our hands are full, which happens surprisingly often. Also nice that I can set my entry light to turn on when I go to work and turn off after I leave, no more fumbling for the light switch and waking my boyfriend up.
customer_reviews.author: lasky13

customer_reviews.title: they connected to my wifi easily and I was able to "turn them on" from ...
customer_reviews.text: These would not transmit power to any device I plugged into them. I had no trouble setting them up with the app, they connected to my wifi easily and I was able to "turn them on" from my phone. But the devices I tried plugging in to them (my cell phone charger, a fan, an air conditioning unit) would not get any power whether the smart plug was turned on or not. Big dissapointment
customer_reviews.author: inspades

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Poor third party software.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very well. It works well, but I don't like the software that you have to download to use it. The software, Jinvoo Smart, is a real battery hog! Apparently it is spying on you, monitoring your wi-fi usage, otherwise why would it be using battery on your phone all the time? I disable it in my phone app and it still works with Alexa and you can turn lights on and off with the phone when needed then disable it again. But if you are gone for a few days and use the scheduling it will drain your battery.
customer_reviews.author: Woody409

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT for the MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about these smart plugs. I really didn't know what to expect since they were so cheap, but I have had NO issues with them AT ALL. I will probably get more of these. They were easy to set up, we use them all of the time and the app works perfectly well. I am very happy with my purchase. I have paired them with my ALEXA and I use both that and the app to turn them off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Chasencruise

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They are very easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are very easy to set up and work really well. Good peace of mind that I can turn the lights on and off remotely. And a really good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- These are not TIMERS. The instructions are in ...
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE- These are not TIMERS. The instructions are in such small type they are very hard to read. I had to use magnifying glass. They do not explain that you have to set COUNTDOWN time to automatically shut off light. If you set device to turn on light at 6:00 PM you have to do COUNTDOWN Timer for 11 hours to have light shut off at say 5:00 AM in the morning. If you want the device and your light to go on and off through out the night you will have to reset every time.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Smart Plugs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 more of these RockBirds smart plugs after having purchased the first two units. Setup was very easy for the last five smart plugs. They work all the time without a snag. I also purchased 2 smart plugs and a smart switch from a better known competitor, which work part of the time due to their software problems. Jinvoo smart plug software has always worked. I am very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill_Ben

customer_reviews.title: These are great around the house
customer_reviews.text: These are great around the house. Because of my lack of tech savvy, it took me quite a while to figure out how to install the first one. After accomplishing the first one, they were a breeze to install and get going. It's been over a month, and they are doing what they are supposed to do. No problems at all. What I really appreciate, when coming home at night, I can turn on the lights before I get home. The cat doesn't seem to care, but the dog certainly appreciates it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cagle

customer_reviews.title: -1 -- Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Believe the bad reviews. They'll work for a short time and while they work, they're great. And then they quit just like everybody else says. You Mess and mess - redo this, redo that - then throw your hands up and throw them away. $$ XX.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly S

customer_reviews.title: Nice when they can be initiated
customer_reviews.text: The first two i bought seemed to work fine. however the second two would not let me get thru the set up. Instead of all the blue LEDs lighting around the button only one seems to light. Originally all of them lit but now only one and it isn't responding. This is happening with both that I received in the second set.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Beach

customer_reviews.title: Works well, mfgr answers questions within 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Still working! Once you figure these out, they work great. "Alexa, turn off lamp" Alexa, turn on fan", and she just says ok and does it. Now if they can truly make these smaller (mini as one states), they'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aminuts

customer_reviews.title: Will Be Buying More
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to set up and get working. A little more effort to get it to sync with Alexa, but now that I've done it once, I'm sure I can easily do it again. Works like a charm through my phone with on/off schedules, and also works perfectly through voice command with Alexa. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Findit Guy

customer_reviews.title: No issues - easy to install and connect with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get these pugged into the wall and connected/configured with Alexa within about 15 min. I will probably buy another pair of these things as they are pretty useful for remotely turning on lights and even setting a timer on my cheap crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: Pyari

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup - Alexa Friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I set these up along with a new Alexa dot under 15-20 mins. At the end I was able to call up Alexa in my bedroom and tell her to turn bedroom lights on. Super quick! It was amazing. Can't wait to get more setup through the house. I'll update my review if I encounter more.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I can now monitor my household items with this wifi plug via my mobile app. The product comes with one set of 2 smart plugs for use. The outlets insert smoothly on my wall outlets. It conveniently helps me turn on and off my electrical items via my phone app.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnda Washington

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had for well over 2 years and they work very well. No issues to report
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it when I tell Alexa to do something
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it when I tell Alexa to do something. Now they carry on conversations with her and play games.
customer_reviews.author: Wm. R Henninger

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the App and Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: These work great with the App and with Alexa. I only had a brief problem when clocks were set back to Eastern Standard Time. It took a few days for the server to get updated.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Deluccia

customer_reviews.title: Need an app to connnect.
customer_reviews.text: After having two other set of plugs that could not connect to my WiFi, these worked the first time and have been working for weeks. They even kept their program through a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Janice K. Dana

customer_reviews.title: One of the two units works great (occasionally shows up as unavailable)
customer_reviews.text: Owned these products for a little over a month now. One of the two units works great (occasionally shows up as unavailable). The other has never worked properly, and now it won't allow a reset and it can't be configured with my new network. When I add more wifi controlled outlets, I will not purchase this product. Worth the couple extra bucks for reliability and better troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe something this affordable works so good and is so easy to set up. Works great with the app, and with Alexa. I only wish IFTTT support were available.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Notto

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Mechanical Timers
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Set multiple timers for any day of the week. Works via WiFi and any cellular connection so you can adjust them from anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Getten

customer_reviews.title: Their registration process will not accept the codes they send ...
customer_reviews.text: Their registration process will not accept the codes they send you through your phone. When you try to have the code sent to you through your email, they send you nothing even though I've tried 2 different emails. Without being able to register you can't add a device. This makes the whole device worthless since you can't use it with alexa as I planned to do. It deserves 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Alexa! Lamp Off.
customer_reviews.text: My first smart house purchase. I use one for the living area lamp, which I always seem to forget to turn off on my way to bed. This solves the problem!
customer_reviews.author: CathyCaryGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup through app. and then Alexa connected fine after I enabled the skill associated with the company's product and clicked "discover devices".
customer_reviews.author: John Hessong

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed so far. The instructions were written in "Chinglish", but I was able to get them associated with the app. After you use the app to assign them names, they are a piece of cake to setup in Alexa. I plan on buying several more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with these for the price. It made my Christmas tree lights super convenient, I just wish I could have used them outside for outdoor lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Echo Dot!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with the echo dot! Only issue, the blue light on the top stays on all the time, annoying in the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: MIke Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but the software is alittle buggy
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but the software is alittle buggy. I found myself always needing to force stopping the app on my Google Pixel XL.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Does not work. Spent hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Does not work. Spent hours trying to get it to connect. There is no support. Positive reviews are deeply suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: coggel

customer_reviews.title: One works fine but the other has started turning off and on
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a 2. One works fine but the other has started turning off and on. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: G Herman

customer_reviews.title: Super handy plus the app is great
customer_reviews.text: Super handy plus the app is great. Lots of options for settings. Way cheaper then WeMo and just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use with existing Tuya app and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as schedule and as expected. Easy to install and use with existing Tuya app and Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: It's just spyware.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you wish to have all you phone data AND home wireless data being sent to Chinese data centers do not use these plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Work well at low price
customer_reviews.text: They work well with WiFi. Setup was very easy. The cost is half the price of TP unit. I will 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: KyMan

customer_reviews.title: works so much better than WEMO
customer_reviews.text: works so much better than WEMO, i had that belkin mess for a year. these connect and stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Eichhorn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price!
customer_reviews.text: These work great with Alexa! The app isn't anything special, but does work and the setup is easy. The only thing that would make this better would be if it worked with IFTTT.
customer_reviews.author: Nik1176

customer_reviews.title: This product works great. Can turn on and off the light with ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Can turn on and off the light with an app on the phone. I do wish that I could manually turn on and off the light though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R. Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: These are nice, but they take up two outlets
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but they take up two outlets, so if you could spare an outlet these would be great, they work with Alexa as well.
customer_reviews.author: Candaisy

customer_reviews.title: weak or poor wifi range
customer_reviews.text: acceptable but...weak or poor wifi range... needs to be close to router to stay reliable...( 25 ft or less through one one wall/floor level )
customer_reviews.author: NVa cold cut

customer_reviews.title: One of them works great. The other cuts in and out
customer_reviews.text: One of them works great. The other cuts in and out. I have rest it a few times. Not sure way it click on and off at times but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both items worked great for about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Both items worked great for about 4 months. After that period, my Echo recognized both devices but would not connect> I tried to reset factory several times with no luck. USELESS.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin K Bligen

customer_reviews.title: Love this switch/plugg so when my daughter goes to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this switch/plugg so when my daughter goes to sleep I can just reach over and turn off TV and lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two boxes of two. One didn't work. Had to send back a complete box so had to return a good one, bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2 pack. Can't get them to connect.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work! Do not buy! My WiFi is too new, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: does not work, at all
customer_reviews.text: this item didn't work at all. what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Belter

customer_reviews.title: I could not get these to connect to my wifi ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not get these to connect to my wifi after over an hour of trying so therefore, I could not use them. I will be returning them. For comparison, I also purchased the Philipps Hue system and it connected within seconds. My suggestion, just get the Hue starter system and purchase the extra bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Orochimaru Azures

customer_reviews.title: Will be sending This garbage back.
customer_reviews.text: ZERO 👎 stars for this Awful product... What a wate of time and money... Will be sending This garbage back... Could not register app nor would it send me a confirmation code to register and begging linking... Instructions are very small and difficult to see... Don't waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: Henry B.

customer_reviews.title: First time buying a smart socket, and never seen any of these before
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. This being my first a smart socket, and never having seen any of these before in person, these sockets are quite large in size. Also, when you turn the socket on and off, there is a pretty loud clicking sound, almost like two magnets conducting. The sound bothers me, but it works and is easy to use with echo as well.
customer_reviews.author: CSSO

customer_reviews.title: Spend money on something that is more user-friendly. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Spend money on something that is more user-friendly. I honestly wish that I had just paid a bit more. These can basically only work as light switches and need to be very close to the router to work. Other than lights, I can't think of something I would want shut on and off that often.
customer_reviews.author: butternut squash

customer_reviews.title: App unable to control device
customer_reviews.text: Connects fine, LED flash but app fails to register and allow remote control of any device plugged into it.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Guy

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: no instruction booklet. i tried the internet but still can't installed it
customer_reviews.author: mrs. m

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing but take up outlet space
customer_reviews.text: These RocketBirds Wifi Smart Sockets will absolutely not connect to Alexa even though it is advertised to do so. I put them right next to my tap and still nothing. There is also no number to contact for help.
customer_reviews.author: st0lnkiss

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the most annoying things I have ever purchased. They constantly go offline and are unusable during that time. Its not a problem with my internet, all of my other wifi enabled devices work fine. Do not waste your money on these. Trash. Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

product_meta.title: Smart Plug, RockBirds Wi-Fi Smart Socket Outlet US Plug, No Hub Required, Timing Function, Compatible with Alexa, Control Lights and Appliances from Your Phone(2Pack)
product_meta.description:
Smart Your Life, Enjoy Your Life, Compatible with Alexa.
Are you still need unplugged the power plug often?
Are you still worry about the safety of household electricity?
Are you still get up very early for breakfast and lack sleeping?
Are you still go back to a dark house after you finished the work?

RockBirds Wi-Fi Socket Solve All Your Problems
App Download : Search " Jinvoo Smart" on App store, Google Play, or Scan the QR code on the User Manual and install it. - Works with " Jinvoo Smart" APP
♠ Step 1: Download the " Jinvoo Smart" App;
♠ Step 2: Plug the Smart Wi-Fi Plug into any outlet;
♠ Step 3: Configure Smart Wi-Fi Plug preferences on the " Jinvoo Smart" App. - Compatible with Alexa ♠ Step 4: Set Your Echo Speaker by Alexa APP
♠ Step 5: Enable Our Skill in Alexa APP

Note:
Please keep in mind that the " Jinvoo Smart" App should be set up first before setting up the Alexa device, please also refer to user manual for more detailed steps.

Specification：
♠ Max current: 10A
♠ Wireless consuming: 3W
♠ Power supply: AC110-240V
♠ Wireless frequency: 2.412~2.484GHz
♠ Wireless IEEE standards: IEEE802.11b/g/n
♠ Security mechanism: WEP/WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK
♠ Security type: WEP/TKIP/ AES
♠ Compatible with Android 4.1 and higher or iOS 7.0 and higher.

Notice:
♠ The maximum current of this plug is 10A and the voltage is 110V. Through calculated, the Max load is 1100W. So please plug in household application with power under 1100W
♠ Please use the Wi-Fi plug in a dry place and don't cover it with plastic bags.
♠ Inappropriate operation may cause safety incident, please read the user manual carefully.

Including:
2x RockBirds Wi-Fi smart plugs
2 x User manul

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars99 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
